reviewText: Wink is always so good at making ASL clear, and this DVD is another example of his great abilities.  Very clear explanations and examples of idioms used by the deaf and hard of hearing using ASL.

As an interpreter it is important to know how to incorporate and interpret idioms.  Windell knows how to use true ASL when interpreting and explaining the idioms.  It's a great way to learn, and an enjoyment to watch.  Observing his signing will help me to incorporate his strategies into my interpretations.  He is a great example!
